name: Choco-Let Me Speak!
description:
You are Charles (or was it Christopher?) Chocolate: a normal citizen of Candy-Land. Armed with your expert debate skills, you decide to cleanse the world of bad faith arguments and intellectual dishonesty (or at least try)!

This game was made for the Mini Jam 66. The theme was Sweets, and the limitation was Only 2 button inputs.

This game was made with LÖVE. You may need to install the Love engine if you are not on windows.

Note: I may or may not make a post-jam version with one more character.
